Here is the list of zodiac signs and their scores based on the concept of \line\:

2. Taurus - 6/10 - Grounded and practical, but can be stubborn about changes

4. Cancer - 5/10 - Emotionally guided, may be uncertain or hesitant in decision-making

9. Sagittarius - 8/10 - Optimistic and expansive, often takes bold action but may struggle with commitment
